name: Ice Man's Journey
description:
My submission to the 2020 Unreal Spring Jam.

Ice Man's Journey is the story of a Stone Age man who was frozen in ice millenia ago. Thousands of years later, Ice Man washes ashore and thaws out... and he longs to return home!

Your quest is to get Ice Man back to his cave so he can rest.

How to Play:

  • Use A + D or Left + Right Arrows to move
  • Use W / Up Arrow / Space to jump
  • Click to swing torch / interact
  • Get Ice Man back to his cave

Installation Instructions:

  • Download the ZIP file
  • Unzip the file
  • Launch "IceMan.exe"

Made in Unreal Engine. Models and textures made with Maya and Photoshop. I worked as a one-man-team; all models, textures, design, gameplay and environment art were created by myself during the jam time.  Sound effects are from various royalty-free sources. The music was made by myself for a different project prior to this jam.
